columns.name: path
columns.description: Path to the Dockerfile in the repository.

columns.name: last_updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the Dockerfile was last updated.

columns.name: git_url
columns.description: Git URL where the Dockerfile can be accessed.

columns.name: html_url
columns.description: HTML URL where the Dockerfile can be accessed.

columns.name: repository
columns.description: Repository metadata associated with the Dockerfile.
